DOC.detailed_description: Research participant previously underwent ß-CIT imaging contacted staff IND enquire whether would like receive ß-CIT scan data . After sign Research Participant Information Consent Form , research participant ask complete questionnaire prior receipt image data . Those research participant request image data send data IND may review data IND ( phone ) and/ study investigator . All research participant ask respond second questionnaire receive image data third study questionnaire approximately six week follow receipt image data .
